name: Avital Spivak
offering: Business Consulting, Group Coaching, Launches for Online Programs, Opt-In Page Creation, Startup Coaches
what_you_do: Avital Spivak helps individuals who struggle with technology to gain confidence and curiosity in using digital tools, providing personalized coaching and support to enhance their tech skills.
who_you_serve: Avital serves a diverse audience including coaches, speakers, entrepreneurs, professionals needing new tech skills, seniors unfamiliar with technology, and individuals with specific challenges.
current_projects: Tech Strategy sessions, workshops, and monthly co-working & Q&A sessions
business_focus: Avital Spivak helps individuals who struggle with technology to gain confidence and curiosity in using digital tools, providing personalized coaching and support to enhance their tech skills. (digital coaching)
